about_the_game:
You are Grippy, a tiny golem born from a flowerpot.
Overcome all obstacles with only the power of your arms and reach the faraway poppy field.

This is a climbing action game of the hardship type in which you need to keep holding the mouse all the way until you reach the goal.
You can catch something with your right hand by right-clicking and with your left hand by left-clicking.
Of course, if you let go of both hands, you fall and start from the beginning.


The path to the poppy fields is filled with beautiful scenery and tricky obstacles.
With practice, you will be able to perform more complex actions such as swinging, climbing, and jumping.

This is a game for hardcore gamers that will test your patience. A momentary lapse of attention can be fatal. You need to play with a sense of tension at all times.
The beautifully designed environments and the tension-enhancing soundtrack enhance the gameplay.

Grippy is a physics-based climbing action game inspired by Human Fall Flat.

Genre: Physics Action / Climbing / Action Adventure
Players: 1 player
Controls: Mouse
Mouse (right and left click for hand-grabbing)
Keyboard (WASD keys to move)
